name: ASAuthorizationPlatformPublicKeyCredentialProvider
desc: A mechanism for providing public key credential requests to an app or service with iCloud Keychain.

items.name: init(relyingPartyIdentifier: String)
items.desc: Creates the object with a relying party identifier.

items.name: var relyingPartyIdentifier: String
items.desc: The domain name of the service to register or authorize against.

items.name: func createCredentialAssertionRequest(challenge: Data) -> ASAuthorizationPlatformPublicKeyCredentialAssertionRequest
items.desc: Creates an assertion request with a challenge.

items.name: func createCredentialRegistrationRequest(challenge: Data, name: String, userID: Data) -> ASAuthorizationPlatformPublicKeyCredentialRegistrationRequest
items.desc: Creates an assertion request with a challenge, name, and user ID.
